string-array.name: h
string-array.item: Ostriches can run more than horses
The gold medals of the Olympic Games are made of silver
You were born with 300 bones, but by adulthood will have only 206
Some bamboo plants can grow up to a meter a day
The state of Florida is bigger than England
On average it takes about 66 days to make a new habit
Mammoths were following walking on earth in the time in which the great pyramids were built
Some penguins can jump 2-3 feet above the water
